verses.name: Genesis 10:1
verses.text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

verses.name: Genesis 10:2
verses.text: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

verses.name: Genesis 10:3
verses.text: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

verses.name: Genesis 10:4
verses.text: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

verses.name: Genesis 10:5
verses.text: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.

verses.name: Genesis 10:6
verses.text: And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

verses.name: Genesis 10:7
verses.text: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

verses.name: Genesis 10:8
verses.text: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 10:9
verses.text: He was a mighty hunter before the Lord: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the Lord.

verses.name: Genesis 10:10
verses.text: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.

verses.name: Genesis 10:11
verses.text: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,

verses.name: Genesis 10:12
verses.text: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.

verses.name: Genesis 10:13
verses.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

verses.name: Genesis 10:14
verses.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.

verses.name: Genesis 10:15
verses.text: And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

verses.name: Genesis 10:16
verses.text: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

verses.name: Genesis 10:17
verses.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

verses.name: Genesis 10:18
verses.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.

verses.name: Genesis 10:19
verses.text: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.

verses.name: Genesis 10:20
verses.text: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.

verses.name: Genesis 10:21
verses.text: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.

verses.name: Genesis 10:22
verses.text: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

verses.name: Genesis 10:23
verses.text: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

verses.name: Genesis 10:24
verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

verses.name: Genesis 10:25
verses.text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.

verses.name: Genesis 10:26
verses.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

verses.name: Genesis 10:27
verses.text: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

verses.name: Genesis 10:28
verses.text: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

verses.name: Genesis 10:29
verses.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.

verses.name: Genesis 10:30
verses.text: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.

verses.name: Genesis 10:31
verses.text: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.

verses.name: Genesis 10:32
verses.text: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
